dcterms:creator: I. A. Gomes
J. P. Fernandes
G. Falcao
S. Kar
S. Tayur
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the rapid adoption of Electric Vehicles (EVs) and the challenges posed to electricity grids, particularly focusing on Vehicle-to-Vehicle Charging (V2VC) technology.
dcterms:title: Global EV Outlook 2023

dcterms:creator: N. Rietmann
B. Hügler
T. Lieven
dcterms:description: This dataset forecasts the trajectory of electric vehicle sales and analyzes the consequences for worldwide CO2 emissions.
dcterms:title: Forecasting the trajectory of electric vehicle sales and the consequences for worldwide CO2 emissions

dcterms:creator: E. Balogun
S. Martin
A. Degleris
R. Rajagopal
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses equitable dynamic electricity pricing methods using dual and subgradient methods, relevant for managing electricity demand in the context of EVs.
dcterms:title: Equitable dynamic electricity pricing via implicitly constrained dual and subgradient methods

dcterms:creator: G. Hoogsteen
L. Winschermann
B. Nijenhuis
N. B. Arias
J. L. Hurink
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on robust and predictive charging strategies for large electric vehicle fleets in grid-constrained parking lots.
dcterms:title: Robust and predictive charging of large electric vehicle fleets in grid constrained parking lots

dcterms:creator: I. Shilov
H. Le Cadre
A. Bušić
A. Sanjab
P. Pinson
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the development of forecast markets aimed at enhancing peer-to-peer electricity trading, relevant for EV owners and operators.
dcterms:title: Towards forecast markets for enhanced peer-to-peer electricity trading

dcterms:creator: Ford Newsroom
dcterms:description: This dataset provides information on the vehicle-to-vehicle charging capabilities of the Ford F-150 Lightning and F-150 Hybrid, showcasing practical applications of V2VC technology.
dcterms:title: Vehicle-to-Vehicle Charging on F-150 Lightning, F-150 Hybrid

dcterms:creator: G. Li
Q. Sun
L. Boukhatem
J. Wu
J. Yang
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a navigation system for mobile electric vehicles that utilizes vehicle-to-vehicle charging through VANET-based communication.
dcterms:title: Intelligent vehicle-to-vehicle charging navigation for mobile electric vehicles via VANET-based communication

dcterms:creator: A.-M. Koufakis
E. S. Rigas
N. Bassiliades
S. D. Ramchurn
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses electric vehicle charging scheduling, both offline and online, incorporating vehicle-to-vehicle energy transfer.
dcterms:title: Offline and online electric vehicle charging scheduling with V2V energy transfer

dcterms:creator: G. Li
L. Boukhatem
L. Zhao
J. Wu
dcterms:description: This dataset explores a direct vehicle-to-vehicle charging strategy within vehicular ad-hoc networks, focusing on communication and energy transfer.
dcterms:title: Direct vehicle-to-vehicle charging strategy in vehicular ad-hoc networks

dcterms:creator: M. Shurrab
S. Singh
H. Otrok
R. Mizouni
V. Khadkikar
H. Zeineldin
dcterms:description: This dataset presents an efficient framework for vehicle-to-vehicle energy sharing, focusing on optimizing energy distribution among vehicles.
dcterms:title: An efficient vehicle-to-vehicle (V2V) energy sharing framework
